title: LFT - Currently Gold IV Solo Q
body:
I'm looking for any team really casual or not. I can play all roles, pretty well with a few champions in each but I wish to get better like everyone. Add me or reply if you have a spot open for a team or just want to do some casuals, not fussed with rank as we all have to start somewhere. 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
